name: UpTime (Starforge Games)
description:
Our submission made for the GameDev.tv Community Jam in 2020.

You play Skip, a human worker whose mind was transfered into a robot body in a dystopian world where survival depends on finding energy sources to ensure your uptime.

When you hear a rumor that the Blackstar Corporations building is high enough to penetrate through the darkened sky, you decide to paly your former employer a visit. There are solar panels on the roof, so if the rumor is true that means ETERNAL LIFE.

Can you fight your way up the skyscraper before your power runs out?

Controls

W A S D - Movement in absolute directions
Left Mouse Button - Fire Weapon
E - Pickup weapon
